name: Summum Aeterna: Prologue
description:
Summum Aeterna: Prologue is a free version of the fast-paced Roguelite set in the Aeterna Universe! The prologue allows players to play some of the features that differentiate this game from other Roguelite titles.

Let's see what incles this free version:

Tutorial


A brief episode to understand the movement and combat controls of Summum Aeterna. Learn to control the King of Darkness in this fast-paced title of action and exploration and dig into your first adventure!

Introduction to the "Seed Mechanic"


Summum Aeterna includes a unique world generator system never seen before in the genre, the Seed Mechanic... Each seed generates a unique world with different enemy behaviour, special events, and even a larger map size, depending on the rarity and the genes contained in the germinated seed.

Learn the basics of this system thanks to Summum Aeterna: Prologue and make each new adventure different from the last!

1 world available


This free version includes seeds for the "Harunokaze Village" world, an eastern setting that includes 2 different areas, a dozen enemies and a powerful final boss... Will you get the final reward every time you germinate a seed?

3 weapon types


The key to surviving in Summum Aeterna is killing every single living (or undead, depending on the enemy) being you encounter. How to achieve that? Well, you play as a cursed monarch… Your weapons are crafted for a king!

The free version allows you to use your swords, pistols, and scythes to make them beg for their miserable lives before they do the same to you... You will choose a starting weapon at the beginning of each world, but you can switch it for a better one, whatever its type... It’s up to you and your skills!
